news_header: Delta Air Lines offers $30,000 to each passenger from a crash-landed flight in Toronto, all of whom survived.
news_original_title: Passengers on crashed Toronto plane offered US$30,000 each
news_text: Delta Air Lines is compensating passengers $30,000 each after a flight crash-landed in Toronto. All 76 passengers and crew survived the incident, which is under investigation. The airline praised the crew's quick response and the plane's safety features. The cause remains unclear, with various theories being explored.
